title: Saturday, September 24, 2022
description: Global markets tumbled this week, deepening fears of a possible recession ahead. Hurricane Fiona weakens to a post tropical storm as it hits eastern Canada.  Some Russian men flee to Turkey as they try to avoid the military call up to fight in Ukraine.
